properties.name: dual-task weather prediction
properties.definition_text: A task in which a subject must attend and respond to two different tasks contained in one experimental run; one task is a feedback driven classification learning task in which a subject is presented with a stimuli (ex-geometric shapes) and has to classify them into one of two categories (ex-rainy or sunny weather), and then receives feedback on whether the response was correct or incorrect.  The other task requires the subject to listen to different tones and count the number of a specific tone.
